name: Justice League VR: The Complete Experience
description: Join Justice League in a cinematic VR experience & master DC Super Hero powers
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8.1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or AMD RX 480 (equivalent or better) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: 64-bit only
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
